title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, and bacon.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook bacon in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Combine pasta with bacon and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill chicken until fully cooked.
Prepare tomato sauce with garlic and spices.
Add grilled chicken and cream to the sauce.
Simmer gently and serve hot.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of vegetables sautéed in a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or pan.
Add garlic and sauté briefly.
Add vegetables and stir fry on high heat.
Pour in soy sauce and mix well.
Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.

title: Beef Burger
summary: A juicy beef burger served with cheese and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Season and grill the beef patty.
Toast burger buns lightly.
Place patty on bun and add cheese.
Top with lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Assemble burger and serve warm.
